help_us_improve.message: Help us improve Ads Filter Control!

hope_you_come_back.message: We hope you come back soon!

hope_you_come_back-text.message: We would like to thank you for using Ads Filter Control. Your opinion is very important to us. If you liked Ads Filter Control, please consider leaving a review. Your feedback helps us improve and offer an even better service. If you have any suggestions or encounter any problems, please do not hesitate to contact us.

why_removing_extension.message: Why are you removing the extension?

reason-3.message: Preference for a lighter browsing experience.

give_us_details.message: Give us more information so we can understand...

questions_and_support-text.message: If there are any questions, proposals, opinions or problems when using the extension, we have our support available every day through the emails
